hint: Name of table to retrieve data from - e.g. task
name: table
label: Table used to query data

hint: Fields to Use - Order of fields control presentation order
name: fields
label: Field List - Recommended maximum of 4 fields, comma delimited, in order of presentation

hint: User defined field labels in order of field list
name: field_labels
label: Override Field Labels - comma delimited and order must match Field List order

hint: Field name in table for storing an image on the record
name: image_field
label: Field name in table storing an image

hint: Limit query results to current user. Expects field named - assigned_to
name: limit_to_user
label: Limit to User - Limit query results to current user. Expects field named - assigned_to

hint: Additional query parameters to help reduce data set
name: encoded_query
label: Additional Data Filter - using Encoded Query format, e.g.  active=true^start_date=today

hint: Service Portal target page to view data in a larger list
name: list_page
label: List Page Target - Target Page for View All panel header link

hint: Service Portal target page to view or edit an individual item
name: detail_page
label: Detail Page Target - Detail page target for item menu 'View Details' link

hint: View to use when target detail page is a form
name: view
label: View name used by Detail Page Target - leave empty to use default view

name: show_panel_header
label: Show Widget's Panel Header

hint: Text to display in the Panel's Header. Depends on Show Panel Header being True.
name: panel_header_text
label: User defined Panel Header Text

name: show_panel_footer
label: Show Panel Footer

hint: Additional item menu links to Service Catalog
name: sc_cat_item
label: Sys ID of Service Catalog Menu Items - comma delimited, links added to item's action menu

hint: Pass the Item's Sys ID as a parameter to the Catalog Item selected
name: sc_item_id
label: Pass Item's Sys ID to Service Catalog Item

hint: Easily make a panel more meaningful to a particular context by adding any of the contextual state classes.
name: context
label: Bootstrap Panel's Contextual alternatives - changes the header and border to Bootstrap defined context colors

name: list_pagination
label: List Pagination

name: maxrecords
label: MAX Record Count

name: order_by
label: Order By Field

name: order_by_direction
label: Use Order By in Descending Order

name: show_date_time
label: Show all Date/Time fields as
